rules_text:
Ward {2} [i](Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.)[/i]
Whenever an opponent activates an ability that isn't a mana ability, draw a card unless they pay {1} for each creatures in your party. [i](Your party consists of up to one of each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.)[/i]
